about.title: Know Who I'M
about.line1: Hi Everyone, I am Chien from Tan Binh, VietNam.
about.line2: I am a front-end developer. I have learned knowledge related to Front-end development and aspire to advance further.
about.line3: I have completed Bachelor's degree in Information Technology at Hanoi University of Industry (HAUI)
about.line4: Apart from coding, some other activities that I love to do!
